subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re:Hearing Your Name Called Outloud.
author: Lisby
full_text:
Oh for god's sake.

Mods?

Ann

On Apr 13, 2008, at 9:20 PM, v1230mail wrote:

> HI,
>
> MY FRIEND YOU NEED TO INVESTIGATE "ARTICLE 8" ASK THE SPIRITS TO TO
> TELL YOU IN DETAIL WHAT "ARTICLE 8" MEANS AND SAYS.
>
> Folks this is what I call true RESEARCH getting information from the
> other side, so we can understand the TRUE political aspect of their
> existence etc. on the other side.
>
> Our Human spirits may not be exploited in the EARTH sense, yet their
> is a sense of being taken advantage of because of our ignorance of the
> other dimension and how it works, understanding the physics and all.
>
> I READ IN ROBERT MONROE BOOKS ABOUT "LOUSH" a form of energy that is
> harvested from our souls. I cannot say more about that because of
> ignorance, except what Monroe wrote about.
>
> As for qualified Scientists, YOU GET THE BEEF THEY WILL COME. In order
> words get the evidence and show it to those who are interested. LIKE
> FINDING OUT IN DETAIL WHAT "ARTICLE 8" means.
>
> ALSO WHY NOT GIVE A SCIENTIST FRIEND A BOX to play with? IF you have
> an old Physics Professor, or acquaintance give them a box, tell them
> how to use it, and then ask them their opinions about the results
> obtained.
>
> I WILL SAY FROM MY READINGS THE UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT HAS A NUMBER
> OF BLACK PROJECTS DEALING WITH HIGH ENERGY PHYSICS, and one of those
> projects deals with the Astral, the soul etc. BUT THE SHAME IS, IT IS
> ALL KEPT IN SECRET.
>
> Now the Indian Mystics talk about BEINGS in the Astral planes that
> want our souls, because our souls are IMMORTAL, and these BEINGS ARE
> NOT IMMORTAL they truly die in a few thousand years.. How they use our
> souls to attain Immortality I do not know.
>
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "itcdeadpeople" <ITCdeadpeople@...>  
> wrote:
> >
> > Hi Nathan. I have taken Monroe's "Gateway Experience" course. :-)
> >
> > I have long observed there seems to be subjects that aren't open for
> discussion, and was
> > recently told via EVPMaker/allophones that such restrictions fall
> under something called
> > "Article 8."
> >
> > I have not gathered any indications, personally, that we are being
> exploited. I have always
> > taken this lack of information to be similar to that of an adult,
> who does not share with
> > children, material that is age inappropriate. In this case, WE
> humans are the children of
> > the universe.
> >
> > What is your definition of "serious research" and how do you suggest
> we enlist of the aid
> > of QUALIFIED scientists who, for the most part, are not willing to
> have their reputations
> > tarnished by associating themselves with such research?
> >
> > Margaret
> >
> >
> > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Nathan Sharman <v1230mail@> wrote:
> > >
> > > Hi read books by Robert Monroe.
> > >
> > > He had the ability to travel out of the body and go to
> > > the Astral.
> > >
> > > There are Technologically advanced Aliens that seem to
> > > control the political situation in the Astral planes,
> > > and they do not want Earth humans to develop full
> > > communication with human spirits in the Astral.
> > >
> > > WE HUMANS ARE BEING EXPLOITED IN THE ASTRAL PLANES,
> > > that is why when communications are going good, all of
> > > a sudden you no longer hear from the spirit any more,
> > > THAT IS BECAUSE THE SPIRIT WAS FORBIDDEN to
> > > communicate further.
> > >
> > > WE NEED TO START DOING SERIOUS RESEARCH AND NOT GET
> > > ALL EXCITED TO JUST HEAR VOICES.
> > >
> > > WE also need to study the physics involved, this is
> > > high energy physics.
> > >
> > > __________________________________________________
> > > Do You Yahoo!?
> > > Tired of spam? Yahoo! Mail has the best spam protection around
> > > http://mail.yahoo.com
> > >
> >
>
>
>
